name: mikroe.click.pac1720
short_description: PAC1720 Click is a compact add-on board that contains an energy monitoring solution. This board features the PAC1720, an I2C configurable dual high-side bidirectional current sensing monitor with precision voltage measurement capabilities from Microchip Technology. The PAC1720 measures the voltage developed across external sense resistors to represent the high-side current of a battery or voltage regulator.
